LanguageData.WorkbenchConnect.LinkWorkbenchDesc: Connect this workbench to another workbench to share bills between them. Click to select a target workbench.
LanguageData.WorkbenchConnect.UnlinkWorkbenchDesc: Disconnect this workbench from its group, giving it its own bill queue again.
LanguageData.WorkbenchConnect.SelectLinkedDesc: Select all workbenches connected to this one.
LanguageData.WorkbenchConnect.WorkbenchesLinked: Workbenches have been linked and will now share bills.
LanguageData.WorkbenchConnect.WorkbenchUnlinked: Workbench has been unlinked from its group.
LanguageData.WorkbenchConnect.CannotLinkDifferentType: Cannot link workbenches of different types.
LanguageData.WorkbenchConnect.CannotLinkTooFar: Workbenches are too far apart to link (max distance: {0}).
